tool_description: Use our AI-powered Multilingual Text Moderation API to flag text containing hate, threats, self-harm, sexual content involving minors, violence, and graphic violence.
name: Text Moderation
title: Text Moderation

api_list.name: Text Moderation
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back flags related to text provided :  hate,  hate/threatening, self-harm, sexual, sexual/minors, violence, violence/graphic
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-moderation2.p.rapidapi.com/moderate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-moderation2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-moderation2.p.rapidapi.com/moderate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-moderation2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
